feed.title: HongHead
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive, and powerful Jekyll theme for presenting professional writing.

entry.title: ET go home
entry.summary: I finally had my wisdom tooth removed. The doctor said my tooth are not in good condition because they have been inflamed many times. My tooth had fused with the bone, so the doctor could only remove the crown and leave the root inside. There is a chance my body might treat the root as a foreign object and push it out, but hopefully nothing happens. I just hope it stays in my mouth and doesnâ€™t ...

entry.title: ET go home
entry.summary: Next weekend, I will go back to Hong Kong. For now, I donâ€™t feel any excitement or anything, but I had a bad dream about forgetting to bring my passport to the airport. That happens every time I travel to another country.

entry.title: Stay at home
entry.summary: I stayed at home all week with nothing much to do. I just updated my cloud server and took some notes. I wanted to try creating daily news, but I noticed there are already AIs doing that. So, I changed my mind. I should do something else, like improving my WebIO website. Iâ€™m still trying to come up with a new idea before my long vacation.
